name: Copper Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Copper Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume the Copper API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume the Copper API | (必填项)

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: company

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: getAll

additionalFields.name: additionalFields
additionalFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Additional Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: assignee_id (值: None) - ID of the user who will own the task to create
details (值: None) - Description of the task to create

companyId.name: companyId
companyId.description: ID of the company to update
companyId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Company ID | 作用: ID of the company to update | (必填项)

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit
returnAll.natural_language_description: 参数名: Return All | 作用: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit | 默认值: False

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.natural_language_description: 参数名: Limit | 作用: Max number of results to return | 默认值: 5

filterFields.name: filterFields
filterFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Filters | 默认值: {}
available_options: assignee_ids (值: None) - Comma-separated IDs of assignee IDs to filter by
project_ids (值: None) - Comma-separated IDs of project IDs to filter by

updateFields.name: updateFields
updateFields.natural_language_description: 参数名: Update Fields | 默认值: {}
available_options: assignee_id (值: None) - ID of the user who will own the task
details (值: None) - Description to set for the task
name (值: None) - Name to set for the task

leadId.name: leadId
leadId.description: ID of the lead to update
leadId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Lead ID | 作用: ID of the lead to update | (必填项)

customerSourceId.name: customerSourceId
customerSourceId.description: ID of the customer source that generated this opportunity
customerSourceId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Customer Source ID | 作用: ID of the customer source that generated this opportunity

primaryContactId.name: primaryContactId
primaryContactId.description: ID of the primary company associated with this opportunity
primaryContactId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Primary Contact ID | 作用: ID of the primary company associated with this opportunity

opportunityId.name: opportunityId
opportunityId.description: ID of the opportunity to update
opportunityId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Opportunity ID | 作用: ID of the opportunity to update | (必填项)

personId.name: personId
personId.description: ID of the person to update
personId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Person ID | 作用: ID of the person to update | (必填项)

projectId.name: projectId
projectId.description: ID of the project to update
projectId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Project ID | 作用: ID of the project to update | (必填项)

taskId.name: taskId
taskId.description: ID of the task to update
taskId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Task ID | 作用: ID of the task to update | (必填项)
